account_watch: Import an account you'd like to observe only
activate_hint: Please arrange the words of the passphrase in the correct order. By doing so, you confirm that you have kept the passphrase safe. Keep in mind that you won't be able to control your account without the passphrase.
activate_request_successful: Successfully requested activation. Your account will be activated in a few moments.
activation_success: Successfully requested activation. Your account will be activated in a few moments.
are_you_sure: Do you you really want to send Burst to them?

click_for_other_platforms: Click here, if you want another platform
click_here_for_help: Click here to know more about it
click_to_copy_passphrase: Click here to copy the passphrase into the clipboard
csv_error_max_limit_multiout: Maximum Limit for Multiout exceeded. Limit is:
csv_error_max_limit_same_multiout: Maximum Limit for Same Amount Multiout exceeded. Limit is:
dashboard_welcome_title: Welcome to Phoenix! Your recent account balances will appear here.
downloading_update: The update is being downloaded. You'll be informed once it finished.
error_alias_not_for_sale: This alias is no longer for sale.
error_alias_not_from_recipient: Alias is owned by account other than recipient.
error_alias_owned_by_other_account: Alias already owned by another account.
error_alias_transfer_genesis: Transferring aliases to Genesis account not allowed.
error_dgs_delivery: An unknown error occured! Marketplace purchase may or may not be delivered.
error_dgs_not_listed: Goods not yet listed or already delisted.
error_goods_not_delivered_yet: Goods have not been delivered yet.
error_no_public_key: Account does not have a public key.
error_post_only: This request is only accepted using POST!
error_public_key_already_announced: Public key for this account has already been announced.
error_public_key_announcement_no_recipie: Public key announcement cannot be attached to transactions with no recipient.
error_public_key_different_account_id: Announced public key does not match recipient account ID.
error_purchase_delivery: Purchase does not exist yet or not yet delivered.
error_purchase_not_exist_or_delivered: Purchase does not exist yet, or already delivered.
error_purchase_refund: Purchase does not exist or is not delivered or is already refunded.
error_recipient_no_public_key: Recipient account does not have public key.
error_recipient_no_public_key_announceme: Recipient account does not have a public key, must attach a public key announcement.
error_send_money: An unknown error occured! Signa may or may not be sent.
error_set_reward_recipient: An unknown error occured! Your reward recipient has not been set.
get_burst_account: Get your free Burst account now.
hint_online_account: You can execute transactions with this account
memorize_passphrase_help: Please store this passphrase in a secure place. This passphrase is needed in order to access your Burst account.
memorize_passphrase_help_addon: If you lose the passphrase you won't be able to do any transactions, i.e. your coins are lost. The passphrase is not recoverable. Keep this passphrase secret. Everybody who knows the passphrase is de facto the owner of the account.
name: Name
new_user_text: Are you a new user? Create a new account and become a Burst member.
no_public_key_activate: This account is not activated yet. Click to activate and secure your account.
no_public_key_warning: Warning!: Your account does not have a public key! This means it's not as protected as other accounts. Please activate your account to obtain your public key.
node_not_set: Could not change node. Most probable it is not reachable.
paste_csv_content: ここにCSVコンテンツを貼り付けます
pin_hint: PIN は、アカウントで行われたアクションを確認するために使用されます。覚えやすい短い英数字を使用できます。 PIN を忘れた場合は、以前に生成したパスフレーズを使用してアカウントを再作成できます。
previous_block_hash: 前のブロック ハッシュ
recipient_no_public_key: 受信者のアカウントには公開鍵がありません。つまり、発信トランザクションは一度もありません。アカウントの残高は __burst__ Signa です。送信する前に、受信者のアドレスをもう一度確認してください。

select_node_description: 接続するピアを選択します。提案されたピアを使用できますが、任意のピア URL を入力することもできます。
